alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Custer and south central Pennington Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keystone, or 9 miles southeast of Hill City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hayward around 400 PM MDT. State Game Lodge around 410 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Buffalo Corrals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
